description: This source file defines a React functional component 'GameCanvas' which renders a game scene onto an HTML canvas. It manages rendering updates at 60 FPS, handles keyboard input events, and applies responsive styling. It imports external functions for rendering the game scene and handling input, and utilizes a state store for game state management.
